Text:
Thanks for all the great uploads!  You're making my workday so much more enjoyable.  
I'd love some more detective and suspence novels if you've got them.
Keep an eye out for more Patricia Cornwell today and tomorrow. Feel free to make a title or author request as well!

Thanks, I love Cornwell :)  If you find something by Michael Connelly, Donna Leon, Jesse Kellerman, Kathy Reichs, James Patterson, Iris Johansen, Tami Hoag or  J.D. Robb they all write pretty good suspence novels :)
